attributes.action: STOP allowing the further removal of vital services from the Vale of Leven Hospital,Alexandria,West Dunbartonshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Accident and Emergency Department was closed in January of 2004.It is vital that the local population have the current access to emergency care retained.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "STOP allowing the further removal of vital services from the Vale of Leven Hospital,Alexandria,West Dunbartonshire."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12571.asp

Prime Minister's Office
